SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am43.View.GUI

Class GameSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am43.View.GUI.SceneController
it.polimi.ingsw.am43.View.GUI.GameSceneController
public class GameSceneController extends SceneController
This class is the controller of the game scene and controls every section of the game scene. It directly interacts with the GUI and the controllers of every section of the scene.
